__TOC__

This page lists all source packages providing Mozilla extensions in the archive.

A list of packages containing install.rdf, which every extensions should have, can be generated by
<pre>
apt-file search install.rdf -l | grep -v "^thunderbird-locale-\|^sunbird-locale-\|^lightning-extension-locale-\|^language-pack-.*-base$\|^enigmail-locale-"
</pre>

An explanation of some of the columns:
* '''Works with latest Mozilla?''' - the extension has been tested with the latest version of Thunderbird or Firefox and known to work. This must be "Yes" for any extension we intend to keep.
* '''Installs from popcon''' - the number of installs according to popcon.ubuntu.com. Where a binary package has been renamed over its lifetime, this may include the contribution from each package where those contributions are significant.
* '''Availability''' - link to where the XPI file is hosted. Availability may influence the decision to keep the extension in the archive. The file must be an installable XPI.
